author: Staff Reporter
text:
Here is an opportunity to understand the basic principles of science by way of doing activities at the District Science Centre, Vellore.

The centre, which is located at Sathuvachari, has created a new facility – Activity Corner. This is meant for students studying in class VIII and above.

They will be given materials for activities and understand basic scientific principles through ‘Hands on-Minds on’ concept, according to a press release.

The main objective of setting up the Activity Corner is to enable students to learn science by doing. A maximum of 20 students will be allowed to carry out the activities here through advance registration from schools. Video demonstration is available, and a facilitator will also be present. The Activity Corner will function every Wednesday, the release said.

A programme on the Activity Corner will be held at 10 a.m. on April 1 at the District Science Centre. There is no registration fee.
title: Learn science by doing at Activity Corner
